name: Poultron
description:
What is it?

Just a robotic qwop-clone casually made on my own in less than one week.

If you ever beat the game with the tripod robot please take a screenshot and contact me :)

Yes the game is intentionally awkward to play.

Controls

Use WASD and the left arrow keys to move limbs and click the fire button with your mouse to shoot.

Tip: To hit enemies with the first robot try tilting it by bending your legs.
